description: सबसे पहले आप सभी को इस आयोजन के लिए बहुत-बहुत बधाई-शुभकामनाएं। इंडिया टु
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Spoke about the Government's vision for a new India & 'Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas' at the India Today conclave. 

Highlighted the transformation taking place in key infrastructure sectors like roads, transportation, railways, power in the last 2.5 years. Shared our efforts for improving social infrastructure particularly in areas like health, education & welfare of Divyang sisters & brothers.

New India is about opportunity & aspiration. We want to empower every Indian & give our citizens the platform to take India to new heights. http://nm-4.com/c3f3
